name: SARSCoronavirus2InterferonGammaQualitativeAndQuantitativeResultsBld
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 Interferon Gamma, Qualitative and Quantitative Results, Bld
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to measurement of T cell-mediated immune response to SARS-CoV-2 using an interferon-gamma release assay (IGRA) in whole blood.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes measurement of T cell-mediated immune response to SARS-CoV-2 in blood using an interferon-gamma release assay (IGRA), with results provided on a qualitative or quantitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes detection of antibodies against SARS-CoV-2.)
